Text: Todule̩ i ño̩ nʼabi ekpa abo ku ma jʼefu Kraisti Jisus fa-i ge̩ n.
Todu o̩lo̩da Afu e-iñmi efu Kraisti Jisus mʼumi gbatane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ o̩lo̩da e-adure kpai e-uku te̩.
Todu e̩wñ kʼo̩lo̩da ma neke che n, ef e̩gbo̩ kʼi ne̩ lef o̩re̩la, abu kʼO̩jo̩ fʼO̩ma e-wñ onugo kpuche̩ wa ef e̩wñ ki bi o̩re̩la e-adure kʼi chi udu adure, i kpʼadure ef o̩re̩la abi,
todu kʼe̩wñ o̩kpakpa e-o̩lo̩da ki jo̩ kpa ef awa kʼa ma tale tʼikpa o̩re̩la n, chai tʼikpa Afu.
Todu abo ku ma lʼikpa o̩re̩la adʼibe tʼe̩wñ o̩re̩la, ama abo ku ma lʼikpa Afu adʼibe tʼe̩wñ e-Afu.
Todu ibe o̩re̩la chʼuku, ama ibe e-Afu chʼiñmi kpai ure̩do̩;
lef e-le̩ oñ ibe o̩re̩la chʼe̩nebi e̩wñ O̩jo̩; todu i chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw e̩wñ o̩loda O̩jo̩ n, i la neke che n;
abo ku ma jʼef ore̩la la neke nyo̩ O̩jo̩ eju n.
Ame̩ muda jʼef o̩re̩la n, chai ef Afu, abu kʼAfu O̩jo̩ dodo ef ume̩. I la che̩wñ kʼe̩ne̩ du ma nʼAfu Kraisti n, e̩ne̩ le̩ chʼe̩ne̩-wñ n.
I muda che̩wñ ku Kraisti dʼef ume̩, año̩la leku te̩ lef adure me̩, afu muda chʼiñmi lef e̩wñ o̩kpakpa.
I la che̩wñ kʼAfu e̩ne̩ ki du Jisus dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku dodo ef ume̩ mak e̩ne̩ ki du Kraisti Jisus dajikwane̩ kwef abo ki ku le̩ ñʼadʼiñmi ñw año̩la-me̩ e-uku-i ge̩ lef Afu-wñ kʼi dodo ef ume̩.
Todabe̩le̩, amo̩maye, ame̩no̩me̩ a che, i chʼo̩re̩la a jʼo̩ o̩me̩ kʼa deju a chʼe̩wñ tʼikpa o̩re̩la n;
todu iche̩wñ kʼame̩ deju achʼe̩wñ tʼikpa o̩re̩la, maku me̩ che ku me̩ ku de̩; ama iche̩wñ ku me̩ nʼAfu le̩ fʼe̩wñ kʼaño̩la ache che ño̩ che̩ kpa ku, ame̩ adeju.
Todu aluka abo kʼAfu O̩jo̩ ane̩ ma le̩, abo le̩ chʼamo̩ga o̩ma e-O̩jo̩.
Todu i chʼafu e-adu ki aje̩ ñwu me̩ railo oñ me̩ dabi gba n; chai Afu e-ki ako me̩ chʼo̩ma oñ me̩ gba, ef e-le̩ a kwa kakini, Ada, Ata.
Afu le̩ onugo abʼafu e-wa gbibenu ka kʼa chʼamo̩ma O̩jo̩;
i la che̩wñ kʼa chʼamo̩ma, mak a ño̩ chʼabo ku ma ajʼe̩wñ ogu-wñ ge̩; a chʼabo ku ma ajʼe̩wñ-o̩gu O̩jo̩, a la abo Kraisti je̩ e̩wñ ogu-wñ; abu kʼawa abʼo̩ chʼo̩bata todu kʼawa ki ño̩ bʼo̩ jʼojima.
Todu u fu lo kakini, O̩bata ki de̩ abajo̩-i bo̩jo̩ ku ma du ñwa ojima ku ma che ku ma bite̩ todu wa n.
Todu eju e̩wñ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi chefe̩rane̩ aneju iko ku ma ako amo̩ga o̩ma O̩jo̩ bite̩.
Todu ibe ekono chʼe̩wñ kʼe̩wñ kʼi chʼe̩nyite̩-i chʼe̩kamuhite̩ ñw ibe̩te̩, i gʼe̩do̩la-wñ che n, chai lef e̩ne̩ ki fu kamuhite̩,
todu ma agba e̩wñ ki chʼe̩nyi te̩ onugo tane̩ bʼo̩wo̩ uko̩lo̩ adu uchile̩che̩ eche te̩ tef omi nʼo̩la-mi e-ojima e-amo̩ma O̩jo̩.
Todu a chema ka kʼe̩wñ du kʼi chʼe̩nyi te̩ jʼafifi, ma jo̩ achefu gbogbo wʼifai.
I la chʼe-le̩ kate n, ama awa onugo kʼa nʼejo̩ga Afu jʼafifi ef o̩to̩to̩la-wa, abu kʼa jʼaneju ku ma ko wa jʼef o̩ga o̩ma le̩, owñ chʼaño̩la-wa e̩gbatane̩.
Todu ma fʼuwa jadu ñw ibe ekono; eju dʼe̩wñ kʼe̩ kibeno, i ño̩ chʼibe ekono de̩-i ge̩ n; todu one̩ fʼe̩wñ li, abile kʼi akibeno aneju-wñ ge̩?
I muda che̩wñ kʼa kibeno e̩wñ kʼeju-wa ma dʼo ta n, a afe̩do̩lichi aneju e̩wñ le̩.
Alu le̩ ge̩, oñ Afu O̩jo̩ ate̩ko e̩gbo-wa ge̩; todu a mʼema alu ki dukpe̩ kʼa chadua e̩wñ n, Afu le̩ onugo muda nʼifi ki ma jʼaka n afi achologu todu wa,
oñ e̩ne̩ ki atejane̩ ef e̩do̩ le̩ chema ibe ki dʼef Afu le̩, todu, i achologu todu abo kiafo̩ lo̩na O̩jo̩.
A la chema kakini, E̩wñ du kpe̩re̩ achʼuko̩lo̩ kʼi anyo̩ ñw abo ku ma afe̩do̩ O̩jo̩, owñ chʼabo ku ma fʼuma do̩ alu kʼi ñwʼibe e-wñ tane̩.
Todu, abo kʼi ma ma tane̩, i fʼuma date̩ tane̩ ku ma chʼuche̩ ojibo o̩ma e-wñ, kʼowñ ki chʼo̩mo̩gba ef amo̩maye wewe:
oñ abo kʼi fʼuma date̩ tane̩, abo le̩ oñ i fʼuma do̩; abo kʼi fʼuma do̩ le̩, abo le̩ oñ i dale ñwu ma; abo kʼi fʼale da ñwu ma le̩, abo le̩ oñ i dʼojima ñwu ma.
Todule̩ ab a ñʼaka ugbo e̩wñ-i ta? Iche̩wñ kʼO̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩-wa, e̩ne̩ akobʼuwa?
E̩ne̩ ki ma do̩wo̩mʼO̩ma e-wñ onugo n, kʼi muda mʼowñ duchʼele te̩ todu wa chaka, ab i ale kʼi ma akʼe̩wñ du chʼuwa ele ufe̩do̩-e̩nyo̩ manyʼu n?
E̩ne̩ agwʼajo̩ nʼabo kʼO̩jo̩ chi ma tane̩? O̩jo̩ chʼe̩ne̩ ki adale:
e̩ne̩ akpʼabi? Kraisti Jisus kʼi leku ku ma la mʼu du dajikwane̩, kʼi ño̩ dʼo̩wo̩ awo̩to̩ O̩jo̩, kʼi lañʼacholugu todu wa?
E̩ne̩ ada wa kpai ufe̩do̩ Kraisti ru taa? O̩bata? abe̩k uwa? abe̩k udoli? abe̩k ukpo̩ta? abe̩k ago-ofo? abe̩k e̩wñ ubailo? abe̩k ugbada?
Owñ chʼalu ku ma ko̩tane̩ kakini,
Ama ef e̩wñ-i du awa adu, adu ño̩ du lef e̩ne̩ ki fe̩do̩ wa le̩.
Todu e̩do̩-mi mugba kakini, Tʼuku, tʼiñmi, tʼamonuche̩ O̩jo̩, tʼamagboji, tʼe̩wñ ki jo̩-i, tʼe̩wñ ki ache ki wa, tʼamukpahiu,
tʼo̩gba, tʼunefu, tʼe̩wñ ojoji omune̩ du kʼO̩jo̩ nyi nekʼada wa kpʼufe̩do̩ O̩jo̩ ki dʼefu Kraisti Jisus Ondu-wa ru n.
